It worked, thanks HeroMaster for this wonderful upload.

All I had to do is put the folder WalkingDead105 in the pack folder of my game. Had no problem so can't really help more than what I said earlier except: I run it on a window 7 64 bits, my antivirus is Kapersky and the other 4 episodes were downloaded from NosTeam (All 4). I hope this kind of information along with my previous comment can help anyone to find out what is going on so they can also enjoy this last episode.

Didn't delete my save from ep 4,  just wont use it to start ep 5, only allows me to randomly generate character info, otherwise works and does show in the game as being installed, character transition doesn't work however.
Solved save problem. Just rewind 4th episode to the final part, finish it and than you should be able to continue. It just takes 5 minutes.

i didnt have the same problem as many of u did, with save files, i continued the game exactly from there where i finished episode 4, GREAT GAME going to buy the whole 5 episodes, becuase its that big :), if there could be more games like these, the end sucks a bit, but ull get over it, and sry for this little spoiler, but anyway ull play it through and will see for urselfs whatll happen :) HF im sure i did

For you guys not able to load your save, this problem has existed since episode 2. When you finish episode 1-4 you need to let the game run through the credits at the end. if you exit early your save wont be complete.
